generalText: An e-commerce platform for authentic sneakers, apparel and accessories, serving more than 50 million users in 170 countries.
developmentText: Participated in writing documentation, migrating dependencies to Swift Package Manager, redesigning the home screen with unique navigation, and developing key features for scalability.

generalText: ​Beehly is a social platform for investors to connect, share ideas, and track stocks, cryptocurrencies, and ETFs.
developmentText: Developed the project from scratch to release, connected CI with automation, integrated web3 for portfolio tracking.

generalText: A companion app for learning English that improves conversational skills through real-life scenarios and chats with artificial intelligence.
developmentText: Built an app from scratch using TCA and SwiftUI, integrated OpenAI API, added in-app purchases, notifications via CustomerIO and automated CI/CD with Codemagic.

generalText: Edible lets you order fresh fruit bouquets, chocolate-dipped treats, and gifts with same-day delivery and exclusive in-app offers.
developmentText: Redesigned the interface, integrated two new payment APIs, added transaction support via CloverConnector SDK and WebSockets, and applied Viper for scalability.

generalText: Mobile app for WildAid Marine Program protecting sensitive marine environments.
developmentText: Developed the app using SwiftUI and Combine, added offline functionality with Realm Sync and applied MVVM for code cleanliness.

generalText: A mobile app for buying subscriptions to coffee, car washes, massages and other services.
developmentText: Built the app from scratch using MVVM, integrated Firebase for data synchronization and notifications, added location-based features with Google Maps SDK.

generalText: An application to protect users and their property with one-touch security call function.
developmentText: Developed from scratch using MVVM, integrated geolocation with Google Maps and Google Places, added payments and reactive UI with RxSwift and Firebase.

generalText: ​LinguaLift is a comprehensive language learning app offering personalized study plans, tutor support, and cultural insights for languages like Japanese, Russian, and Hebrew.
developmentText: Added Japanese language learning, implemented new language learning features, added support for push notifications and a new leaderboard.

generalText: An app for finding sports venues, booking courses and tracking progress.
developmentText: Implemented search and filtering with Google Maps SDK, Google Places and Google Street View, applied MVP and integrated API with Alamofire.
